パッケージ org.interledger.ilqp

This package contains classes related to the Interledger Quoting Protocol (ILQP) which is one protocol in the overall Interledger suite of protocols.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    LiquidityCurve
    Liquidity curves describe the relationship between input and output amount for a given path between a pair of ledgers.
    LiquidityPoint
    Defines a point on the liquidity curve, a mapping between an input amount (X), and an output amount (Y).
    QuoteByDestinationAmountRequest
    A request for a quote that specifies the amount to deliver at the destination address.
    QuoteByDestinationAmountResponse
    A quote sent in response to a request of type QuoteByDestinationAmountRequest.
    QuoteBySourceAmountRequest
    A request for a quote with a fixed source amount to determine the destination amount.
    QuoteBySourceAmountResponse
    A quote sent in response to a request of type QuoteBySourceAmountRequest.
    QuoteErrorResponse  
    QuoteLiquidityRequest
    A request to receive liquidity information between the current ledger and the destination account.
    QuoteLiquidityResponse
    A response to a quote request with liquidity information regarding transfers between the current ledger and the destination account.
    QuoteRequest
    A parent interface for all quote requests in ILQP.
    QuoteResponse
    A parent interface for all quote responses in ILQP.
    QuoteSelectionStrategy  
    QuoteService<T extends QuoteRequest,R extends QuoteResponse>
    A quote service delivers quote requests to connectors and returns their response.
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    LiquidityCurve.Builder
    A builder for instances of LiquidityCurve.
    LiquidityPoint.Builder  
    QuoteByDestinationAmountRequest.Builder
    A builder for instances of QuoteByDestinationAmountRequest.
    QuoteByDestinationAmountResponse.Builder
    A builder for instances of QuoteByDestinationAmountRequest.
    QuoteByDestinationAmountResponse.Builder.Impl
    A private, immutable implementation of QuoteByDestinationAmountResponse.
    QuoteBySourceAmountRequest.Builder
    A builder for instances of QuoteBySourceAmountRequest.
    QuoteBySourceAmountResponse.Builder
    A builder for constructing instances of QuoteBySourceAmountResponse.
    QuoteLiquidityRequest.Builder
    A builder for instances of QuoteLiquidityRequest.
    QuoteLiquidityResponse.Builder
    A builder for instances of QuoteLiquidityResponse.
  • 例外のサマリー 
    例外 説明
    InterledgerQuotingException  

パッケージorg.interledger.ilqpの説明

This package contains classes related to the Interledger Quoting Protocol (ILQP) which is one protocol in the overall Interledger suite of protocols. For more details about the ILQP, reference IL-RFC-8.
関連項目:
"https://github.com/interledger/rfcs/blob/master/0008-interledger-quoting-protocol"
